body: A Habitat houses animals. Unlike a Stall or Hatchery, a Habitat provides comfortable lodging for exotic or rare creatures. This room contains cages and walled chambers for the resident creatures, with at least one wall constructed of bars or windows to allow visitors to observe the creatures. A Habitat built to house birds is often constructed with tall poles and netting to keep the creatures from flying away.
name: Habitat
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Rooms/Habitat
